info.title: Netatmo - Weather
info.description: This is a sample test for describing NETATMO's APIs with the OAS3 standard definition using swagger.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Netatmo API

tags.name: Weather Station
tags.description: Info - ALl weather station & Modules data

get.summary: Retrieves publicly shared weather data from Outdoor Modules within a predefined area.

parameters.name: lat_ne
parameters.description: latitude of the north east corner of the requested area. -85 <= lat_ne <= 85 and lat_ne>lat_sw

parameters.name: lon_ne
parameters.description: Longitude of the north east corner of the requested area. -180 <= lon_ne <= 180 and lon_ne>lon_sw

parameters.name: lat_sw
parameters.description: latitude of the south west corner of the requested area. -85 <= lat_sw <= 85

parameters.name: lon_sw
parameters.description: Longitude of the south west corner of the requested area. -180 <= lon_sw <= 180

parameters.name: required_data
parameters.description: To filter stations based on relevant measurements you want (e.g. rain will only return stations with rain gauges). Default is no filter. You can find all measurements available on the Thermostat page.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: True to exclude station with abnormal temperature measures. Default is false.

get.summary: Returns data from a user Weather Stations (measures and device specific data).

parameters.name: get_favorites
parameters.description: To retrieve user's favorite weather stations. Default is false.

get.summary: Retrieve data from a device or module

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Timelapse between two measurements. Timelapse between two measurements. temperature(째C), co2(ppm), humidity(%), pressure(mbar), noise(db), rain(mm), windStrength(km/h), windAngle(angles), guststrength(km/h), gustAngle(angles). \r 30min-1-3hours = min_temp, max_temp, min_hum, max_hum, min_pressure, max_pressure, min_noise, max_noise,sum_rain. 1day-1week-1month = date_max_gust, date_max_hum, min_pressure, date_min_pressure, date_max_pressure, min_noise, date_min_noise, max_noise, date_max_noise, date_min_co2, date_max_co2

parameters.name: date_begin
parameters.description: Timestamp of the first measure to retrieve. Default is null.

parameters.name: date_end
parameters.description: Timestamp of the last measure to retrieve (default and max are 1024). Default is null.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of measurements (default and max are 1024)

parameters.name: optimize
parameters.description: Determines the format of the answer. Default is true. For mobile apps we recommend True and False if bandwidth isn't an issue as it is easier to parse.

parameters.name: real_time
parameters.description: If scale different than max, timestamps are by default offset + scale/2. To get exact timestamps, use true. Default is false.

date_setup.description: date when the weather station was set up

last_status_store.description: timestamp of the last status update

reachable.description: true if the station connected to Netatmo cloud within the last 4 hours

co2_calibrating.description: true if the station is calibrating

station_name.description: name of the station - DO NOT USE ANYMORE - use home_name and module_name instead

data_type.description: array of data measured by the device (e.g. "Temperature","Humidity")

read_only.description: true if the user owns the station, false if he is invited to a station

home_id.description: id of the home where the station is placed

home_name.description: name of the home where the station is placed

temp_trend.description: trend for the last 12h (up, down, stable)

pressure_trend.description: trend for the last 12h (up, down, stable)

data_type.description: Array of data measured by the device (e.g. "Temperature","Humidity")

reachable.description: true if the station connected to Netatmo cloud within the last 4 hours

temp_trend.description: trend for the last 12h (up, down, stable)

last_message.description: timestamp of the last measure update

last_seen.description: timestamp of the last status update

data_type.description: Array of data measured by the device (e.g. "Temperature","Humidity")

reachable.description: true if the station connected to Netatmo cloud within the last 4 hours

temp_trend.description: trend for the last 12h (up, down, stable)

last_message.description: timestamp of the last measure update

last_seen.description: timestamp of the last status update

sum_rain_1.description: rain measured for the last hour (mm)

reg_locale.description: user regional preferences (used for displaying date)

feel_like_algo.description: algorithm used to compute feel like temperature, 0 -> humidex, 1 -> heat-index
